prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Guitar, Strings, Organ, Bass, Synth Lead, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This track features Drums, Guitar, Strings, Organ, Bass, and a Synth Lead, but no Piano.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Drums, Guitar, Strings, Organ, Bass, and a Synth Lead, omitting Piano.

Style 3:
This song is made up of Drums, Guitar, Strings, Organ, Bass, and a Synth Lead, Piano excluded.
